p:
The novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 presents a genetic similarity of 79.5% with SARS-CoV and 96% with the bat SARS-like coronavirus.
10 Similarly to other coronaviruses, it can access the nervous system via the haematogenous route or by retrograde axonal transport; the latter mechanism probably explains the frequent association with anosmia. Before entering cells, the virus binds to the ACE2 receptor,
11 which is present in many types of human cells.
